'''''"Get Over Here!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to shoot down a flying [[Fungus]].
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name refers to {{w|Scorpion (Mortal Kombat)|Scorpion}}'s  catchphrase from the {{w|Mortal Kombat}} series.
